index.md
Notes/Offshoring tasks and jobs is a form of global wealth redistribution..md
Notes/Improving the material well being of the world's poorest is one of the ways we can increase our collective computational capacity which will translate into economic growth and prosperity..md
Notes/Genius is not in the person but the network, some nodes are simply more productive and generative than others..md
Notes/Power is the capacity (or perceived capacity) of an entity to manipulate energy, matter, and information  to achieve its goals..md
Notes/One of the true curses of knowledge is that the awareness of the scale of ignorance grows with it, an understanding of how uncertain things really are, and can act as an impediment to action.md
Notes/Humans are the distributed computational substrate that the economy runs on..md
Notes/Large Language Models are the technology that humanity needs to avoid collapsing due to information overload, to help us identify signal in the noise.md
Notes/Technologies are the primary means by which we increase our capacity to process and manipulate energy, matter, and information..md
Notes/What looks like inefficiency in the short run results in robustness in the long run.md

Notes/There is likely more driving the evolution of organisms than genetic mutation and recombination. We may discover that there is some informational mechanism that passes information to offspring.md
Notes/Consciousness arising from matter is the same sort of thing thing as ideologies, egregores, memes, etc having a life of their own..md
Notes/Civilisation is far more precarious than most people think..md
Notes/Markets are a distributed computational tool that humanity uses to explore the possibility space of technologies and select the ones that are useful..md
Notes/Luck plays a far greater role in wealth generation than most people believe..md
Notes/Taxation is not theft.md
Notes/Advertising is an assault on agency.md
Notes/Working full time (40 hours a week) is not conducive to living a flourishing life for most people..md
Notes/All evil is borne of sickness, physical or spiritual..md
Notes/Ensuring internet access for all is the silicon bullet for inequality.md

Notes/If you believe something to be true and you do not speak it or act on it, especially when confronted with falsehoods that stir something within you, you are as bad as the vocal liars and do harm to yourself and society..md

Notes/Religions are a social technology that get people to act pro-socially without doing the hard work of understanding why, allowing for greater social coherence and coordination with minimal effort..md

Notes/When analysing a religion, it's important to disentangle the precepts or teachings that relate to living practically in the context the text was written in from the timeless truths the text is attempting to convey..md
Notes/A crucial role of government is to act as a gardener, creating fertile conditions for the sorts of things we want to emerge and come to bear fruit, and pulling weeds..md
Notes/Governance is required at all scales we have influence over. Today, this means our planet. In the future, our solar system and hopefully beyond..md
